bio.intro: I'm a passionate full-stack developer who loves creating innovative web applications and exploring cutting-edge technologies.
bio.tagline: Building the future, one line of code at a time
bio.aboutMe: With a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I enjoy turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and tackle challenging problems.
bio.currentFocus: Currently focusing on React, Next.js, and modern web development practices.

experience.title: BreatheEasy
experience.description: Created an generative web AI application which gives medicinal advise based on the collected data using external hardware for chronic disease.

experience.title: Computer Vision Developer
experience.description: Created an interactive Doom game controlled entirely through hand tracking gestures using computer vision techniques.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.company: CNN model that detects bad leaf spots
experience.description: Designed and implemented a Convolutional Neural Network model for image classification and pattern recognition tasks.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed a face detection attendance system with real-time recognition capabilities and database integration.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Built a responsive website from scratch using core web technologies, focusing on clean design and user experience.
